channel.title: :( weird error! :( 2. questions inside! (still) trouble with npcdrops
channel.description:
OK il make it as simple as possible... i have troubles with npcdrops.cfg ive figured out HOW it happened but i need to know WHY it happens and how to fix it... HOW IT HAPPENS: when i have over 15 drops for a npc (chaos elemental) Question #1: WHY it happens? Question #2: IF then how to fix it?
the error on my runserver.bat :
rTc HQ 1.1 - Created by stalker ------------------------------------------------------- Loading npcs... drops... Exception in thread "main" java.lang.ArrayIndexOutOfBou ndsException: 45 at NPCHandler.loadNPCDrops(NPCHandler.java:1254) at NPCHandler.<init>(NPCHandler.java:426) at server.main(server.java:97)

item.title: :( weird error! :( 2. questions inside! (still) trouble with npcdrops
item.dc:creator: @CoonHunter CoonHunter
item.description:
@CoonHunter wrote:

well in the item2.java file… is where your problem wont be… i can put in about that much help… but umm check the npchandler.java file for that npc ID… and make sure it doesnt say for 15 items to be dropped

Read full topic

item.title: :( weird error! :( 2. questions inside! (still) trouble with npcdrops
item.dc:creator: @illslayu illslayu
item.description:
@illslayu wrote:

nope ive checked everything… only clue i found is over 15 drops: if i have 15 drops (with “/” before the other 6 drops)
then it works just fine but i need 21 drops for chaos elem cuz its an ultimate boss (also… im using devolution v7)
Also what does this "“Exception in thread “main” java.lang.ArrayIndexOutOfBoundsException: 45"” mean

Read full topic
